duties_responsibilities.duty: Understanding and implementing DevOps functions, including code check-in, Jenkins monitoring, and automation testing
Implementing modern and efficient automated ways of performing tasks
Collaborating with the team to ensure ease of understanding and working with code/playbooks

Strong understanding of Ansible/AWX/Tower, shell scripting, Oracle/Database queries, reverse engineer programming languages, Agile methodologies, REST API, git/code review/testing, CI/CD, Python, K8s/Openshift

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field (Master's preferred)
